Actions.Name: Delete Video
Actions.Description: This operation deletes the specified video and all related insights found when the video was indexed.

Actions.Name: Delete Video Source File
Actions.Description: This operation deletes the video source file, but does not delete the insights found when the video was indexed.

Actions.Name: Get Account
Actions.Description: This operation returns the details of the user's account.

Actions.Name: Get Account Access Token
Actions.Description: Gets an account access token (expires after an hour).

Actions.Name: Get Accounts
Actions.Description: This operation returns the details of the user's accounts.

Actions.Name: Get Video Thumbnail
Actions.Description: Get thumbnail image of a video.

Actions.Name: Get Video Captions
Actions.Description: This operation returns the captions extracted when the video was indexed.

Actions.Name: Get Video ID by External ID
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves the video ID corresponding to the external ID.

Actions.Name: Get Video Index
Actions.Description: This operation gets a video and its insights.

Actions.Name: List Videos
Actions.Description: This operation gets a list of all videos in the account.

Actions.Name: Re-index Video
Actions.Description: This operation re-indexes the given video.

Actions.Name: Search Videos
Actions.Description: This operation performs a search for text, keywords, and visual content.

Actions.Name: Update Face Name
Actions.Description: This operation updates the name of the given face and trains the face model to recognize that face in future videos.

Actions.Name: Update Video Transcript
Actions.Description: Updates the transcript of the video.

Actions.Name: Upload video and index
Actions.Description:
This operation uploads the given video, starts indexing it, and returns a new video index ID.
The supported formats are listed here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/media-services/media-services-media-encoder-standard-formats).
